scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production bunup src/locales.ts --format esm --dts --external react --external @sylphx/rosetta && bunup src/index.tsx src/server.tsx --format esm --dts --external react --external @sylphx/rosetta --jsx.runtime automatic --jsx.import-source react --no-clean && bunup src/loader.ts src/sync.ts --format esm,cjs --dts --external react --external @sylphx/rosetta --no-clean && npm run build:fix-jsx
scripts.build:fix-jsx: find dist -name '*.js' -exec sed -i.bak 's/jsx-dev-runtime/jsx-runtime/g; s/jsxDEV/jsx/g' {} \; && find dist -name '*.bak' -delete
scripts.dev: bunup src/index.tsx src/server.tsx src/loader.ts src/sync.ts --format esm --dts --external react --external @sylphx/rosetta --watch
